Text: considering this release has only the critical updates included, 802 megabytes seems off, to be honest.. what did you use as a source? SP0 + SP3 slipstream, or official .iso with sp3?

you need to check "show updates" in the add&remove..  you had that unchecked

and yeah the IE and WMP are not updated, which I think is great. Only the security updates are included (although windowsupdate says IE8 is a high-priority update, it is utter crap)
but i agree that logo in the installation screen is a turn-off
Thanks for this torrent. XP work perfect. I already installed it to 5 computer.
